title: Paper Presentation
description: Participants present a paper on a topic of their choice related to technology or computer science. The presentation should be followed by a Q&A session.
rules: Participants must submit a paper in advance.
Presentations should not exceed 15 minutes. (Expected 7-10 minutes)
Q&A session should not exceed 5 minutes.

title: Code Relay
description: Code Relay is a competitive programming event where problems must be solved in a strict sequential order. The output of each question serves as the input for the next.
rules: Participants must solve problems in a sequential order.
Participants must submit their solutions within the given time limit.

title: Query Craft
description: Query Craft is an SQL based event where participants are given a database and must write SQL queries to extract specific information. The queries will be evaluated based on correctness and efficiency.
rules: Queries will be evaluated based on correctness and efficiency.
Participants must submit their queries within the given time limit.
more_info: Rules of Round 2: Participants will be given a database and must write SQL queries to extract specific information. The queries will be evaluated based on correctness and efficiency.

title: Neural Isai
description: Neural Isai is a fun music event filled with multiple rounds of trivia questions based on tamil songs and music.
rules: Rules will be announced on the day of the event.
